pulls.title: Some fixes
pulls.author: csosto-pk
pulls.body:
I did not compile it. It may need to fix the references to compile. 

Please proof read. Also please check if OQS OpenSSH encodes K_PQ as mpint. Since it sia 256-bit value it could, it is not necessary to encode it as as a byte arraw because it is not the concatenation of two things. 

I would also suggest to consider dropping MLKEM-512, but since you have the IANA assignments, I guess you can keep it.

comments.author: alharrison
comments.body:
> I did not compile it. It may need to fix the references to compile.
> 
> Please proof read. Also please check if OQS OpenSSH encodes K_PQ as mpint. Since it sia 256-bit value it could, it is not necessary to encode it as as a byte arraw because it is not the concatenation of two things.
> 
> I would also suggest to consider dropping MLKEM-512, but since you have the IANA assignments, I guess you can keep it.

It actually looks like it did not start this way (https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/openssh/issues/119), but was changed in 2022 here: https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/openssh/commit/e9b0f6f8896039824f78a43623cd14b67f24e2ce so I think we are good there.
Sorry, wrong reference here. It should be [draft-ietf-sshm-mlkem-hybrid-kex] instead of the NTRU one
